TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IPphManager

summary.span: Fornece controle de interromper e iniciar canais de escuta.

span.span: Provides stop and start control of listener channels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks é introduzido no [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void StartProcessProtocolListenerChannel([in]string protocolId, class System.Web.Hosting.IListenerChannelCallback listenerChannelCallback) cil managed
Public Sub StartProcessProtocolListenerChannel (protocolId As String, listenerChannelCallback As IListenerChannelCallback)

summary.span: Inicia o canal de escuta do protocolo de processo especificado.

span.span: Starts the specified process protocol listener channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks é introduzido no [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. MemberSignature.Value: public void StopProcessProtocol (string protocolId, bool immediate);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void StopProcessProtocol([in]string protocolId, bool immediate) cil managed
Public Sub StopProcessProtocol (protocolId As String, immediate As Boolean)
public: void StopProcessProtocol(System::String ^ protocolId, bool immediate);

param.name: protocolId
param.span: A ID de protocolo do canal de escuta a ser interrompido.

span.span: The protocol ID of the listener channel to stop.

param.name: immediate
param.span: para notificar o gerenciador de protocolo do processo para interromper todos os canais de escuta de forma síncrona; para interromper todos os canais de escuta de forma assíncrona.

span.span: to notify the process protocol manager to stop all listener channels synchronously; to stop all listener channels asynchronously.

summary.span: Interrompe todos os canais de escuta do protocolo.

remarks.format: ## Remarks é introduzido no [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void StopProcessProtocolListenerChannel([in]string protocolId, int32 listenerChannelId, bool immediate) cil managed
Public Sub StopProcessProtocolListenerChannel (protocolId As String, listenerChannelId As Integer, immediate As Boolean)
public: void StopProcessProtocolListenerChannel(System::String ^ protocolId, int listenerChannelId, bool immediate);

param.name: protocolId
param.span: A ID de protocolo do canal de escuta.

span.span: The protocol ID for the listener channel.

param.name: listenerChannelId
param.span: A ID do canal de escuta.

param.name: immediate
param.span: para notificar o gerenciador de protocolo do processo para interromper todos os canais de escuta de forma síncrona; para interromper todos os canais de escuta de forma assíncrona.

span.span: to notify the process protocol manager to stop all listener channels synchronously; to stop all listener channels asynchronously.

summary.span: Interrompe o canal de escuta do protocolo de processo especificado.

span.span: Stops the specified process protocol listener channel.
